SPACs saw a dramatic slowdown in April as SEC issued accounting guidance that could require new and existing SPACs to recalculate financials, CNBC says. What does this mean for space SPACs like Astra, BlackSky, Momentus, Rocket Lab, and Spire? https://t.co/1KnQ3fQtnq

DOJ: The bulk of the $285K Tenza obtained came from PPP loans applied for in his and his mother-in-law’s names for businesses that didn't exist. He spent the funds to pay off a swimming pool, two cars, credit card debt and dog breeder. https://t.co/DV30YVRrVh

#SATELLITE2021 has moved from July in D.C. to Sept. 7-10 at the Gaylord in National Harbor, Md.  

The reason? D.C. says it will continue to use the Walter E. Washington Convention Center as a mass vaccination site for foreseeable future.

Busy week on the space finance front: @hawkeye360  raises $55M Series C to complete ship-tracking constellation; @astranis_space raises $250M Series C to accelerate small GEO development; @Telesat raising $500M in debt to help finance Lightspeed broadband constellation

.@SpaceXStarlink was one of the big winners, with only LTD Broadband, Charter and the Rural Electric Cooperative Consortium winning larger shares of the $9.2B the FCC will dole out in coming years to bring broadband to underserved homes and businesses.

Hughes Network Systems, which provides satellite broadband from GEO, won $1.2 million in RDOF funding. Here's the FCC's announcement and full list of providers picked to share the $9.2B subsidy: https://t.co/faIzxoaCWG
.@SpaceX won $885 million under the FCC's Rural Digital Opportunity Fund auction. https://t.co/f9XeA5jlfc?

Sen.  Roger Wicker’s Space Preservation And Conjunction Emergency (SPACE) Act of 2020, S. 4827, is one of 13 bills the Senate Commerce Committee is set to markup Nov. 18.
David Noble was NASA’s White House liaison and deputy chief of staff under Obama.
David Weaver was NASA AA for the Office of Communications under Obama. His resume includes a stint as a Biden legislative aide when Biden was in the Senate.
The Commerce team includes former NOAA chief Kathryn Sullivan, another astronaut.

Quite a few familiar and expected names on Biden’s NASA transition team, including former astronaut Pam Melroy and former NASA chief scientists Ellen Stofan and Waleed Abdalati. Full list here: https://t.co/PFjdg3CbXm…

Satellite 2021 has been rescheduled from its normal March berth to July 26-29. This year’s trade show, the last in-person conference many of us attended, was cut short as D.C. imposed restrictions on large gatherings.

Correction: There are at least three satellite companies on the FCC's just-released qualified bidders list for the upcoming Rural Digital Opportunity Fund auction: SpaceX, Hughes and Viasat. Full list here: https://t.co/qzBQNdtmoH https://t.co/1vOeTWwoXG
RDOF seeks to bring broadband to rural and underserved parts of the U.S. by providing some $20B in  subsidies via a reverse auction startling later this month.
LEO systems like SpaceX's Starlink promise lower latency because signals don't have as far to travel compared to GEO.
